subject: Marathon Running
Doping (Sports)
Track and Field
Chicago Marathon
London Marathon
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Liliya Shobukhova, who won the Chicago Marathon from 2009 to 2011 and the London race in 2010, paid the Russian athletics federation $550,000 to cover up a positive doping case, the German television channel ARD and the French sports daily L'Équipe reported.
snippet: Liliya Shobukhova, who won the Chicago Marathon from 2009 to 2011 and the London race in 2010, paid the Russian athletics federation $550,000 to cover up a positive doping case, the German television channel ARD and the French sports daily L'Équipe...
